org.wonderly.log
Class StreamFormatter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Formatter
      java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter
          org.wonderly.log.StreamFormatter

public class StreamFormatter
extends SimpleFormatter

A stream based formatter that creates single line log entries The property org.wonderly.log.streamformatter.brief can be set to eliminate the logger name from the output.

          Whether brief format is active
